rules.title: beginning and end
rules.description: infer that a TemporalEntity begins before it ends
rules.rule: time:TemporalEntity(?a), time:hasBeginning(?a, ?i1), time:Instant(?i1), time:inXSDDateTimeStamp(?i1, ?t1), time:hasEnd(?a, ?i2), time:Instant(?i2), time:inXSDDateTimeStamp(?i2, ?t2), greaterThan(?t1, ?t2) -> owl:Nothing(?a)

rules.title: ProperInterval
rules.description: infer that a TemporalEntity is a ProperInterval (i.e. has the same beginning and end)
rules.rule: time:TemporalEntity(?a), time:hasBeginning(?a, ?i1), time:Instant(?i1), time:inXSDDateTimeStamp(?i1, ?t1), time:hasEnd(?a, ?i2), time:Instant(?i2), time:inXSDDateTimeStamp(?i2, ?t2), greaterThan(?t1, ?t2) -> time:ProperInterval(?a)

rules.title: before and after
rules.description: infer that two TemporalEntities are before and after one another
rules.rule: time:TemporalEntity(?a), time:hasEnd(?a, ?i1), time:Instant(?i1), time:inXSDDateTimeStamp(?i1, ?t1), time:TemporalEntity(?b), time:hasBeginning(?b, ?i2), time:Instant(?i2), time:inXSDDateTimeStamp(?i2, ?t2), lessThan(?t1, ?t2) -> time:before(?a, ?b)

rules.title: interval before and after
rules.description: infer that two ProperIntervals are before and after one another
rules.rule: time:ProperInterval(?a), time:hasEnd(?a, ?i1), time:Instant(?i1), time:inXSDDateTimeStamp(?i1, ?t1), time:ProperInterval(?b), time:hasBeginning(?b, ?i2), time:Instant(?i4), time:inXSDDateTimeStamp(?i2, ?t2), lessThan(?t1, ?t2) -> time:intervalBefore(?a, ?b)
